title: Bug 13620 - The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with a large amount of white space
OB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with a large amount of white space.
EB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page should not have excessive white space.
SR: The vertical alignment of the text should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING. Steps to reproduce the issue: 1) Load a project from the repository, 2) Select a source folder, 3) Open Properties, 4) Select Java Source Attachment, 5) [Details]. You will notice an info label in the middle of the dialog.
